comment: Tests and quizzes can be taken multiple times. I was very weary as I heard this class was difficult, however all the assignments are so easy and require little effort. Take him for an EASY A. I would take him again if given the chance.

Brett Katzman stepped in to finish my econ class because my actual professor had health problems. I only had him for a few weeks but from what I could tell, he is a very good professor. His lectures are very easy to follow, and he thuroughly explained the topics. He seems to genuinely care about his students.

Brett is a nice teacher and does care about his students learning. However, study guides never matched the test. There are no homework assignments or quizzes to try to boost your grade. Lastly, his lectures only make sense if he explains them. Trying to go through them alone will leave you confused and with a headache.
Awesome and caring professor. Take him at all costs if you are able too.
Multiple attempts are made on quizzes and tests, so it's an Easy A!!!
Easy A!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class

comment: I took his online asynchronous course because it was one of the few left. I wish I just took another class instead and waited for to take MATH1111. He seems like a nice guy, but the class was completely through aleks. I wouldn't have minded if he put up any form of help like lectures. If you struggle in math, I don't recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: I took his online MATH 1111 course. As much as a nice person he seems, the class was completely through ALEKS. He didn't upload a single lecture or any form of help. It personally wasn't the class for me, but if that works for you, that's cool. As someone who has a difficult time with math, I don't recommend this for people like me.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Everything was done on ALEKS. You have to teach yourself. Curves your grade at the end by a little. Tests are monitored. Seems like a good professor, but some students need some additional help. Make sure to make a groupchat, but the TA might get in there somehow. Cheating's super tempting in this class, but please don't do it.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: He was by far one of the best teachers I have ever had. I took his MATH 1111 in Fall 2020 as a dual enrolled student. He understood and respected that his students have other classes. There is a book for this class but you don't really need to read it. He does not hold any lectures but he told me if I need help just email him.

this was one of the hardest classes i have ever taken. professor isnt involved in the class and you have to teach yourself everything. tests are also pretty hard and we would only get the study guide two days before the test
Great teacher and would take him again!!!

i had professor katzman for math1111 in a completely online setting. everything is graded through the ALEKS program, which i dont mind, but it was a large amount of homework. there are 4 tests, and are basically the entire weight of your grade along with homework. all tests are lockdown browser. overall, it was a generally easy class.
rating_tags: Test heavy--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: This professor doesn't teach anything. You teach yourself through ALEKS. I sent an email to him in the beginning with questions about the class and thought he was a pretty cool guy. That was until I had a problem with a test. I emailed him about it, and at first, he accused me of lying. He was no help and even stopped responding to my emails.

I had him for MATH 1111, and he was the only teacher that did not teach anything. If you are looking to learn by yourself and watch videos online then take this class. He is really quick to respond to emails which is great.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: I am rating this teacher different than everyone else because I have him for math not econ. He does not teach, as he is an econ teacher. So if you are okay with learning 100% from ALEKS then its great. He is helpful if you seek out his help, and he seems very nice despite having no contact with him. He only got a 3 because he doesn't teach us.

Professor Katzman was an amazing professor. He explains material great and makes class entertaining. He gives out extra credit ALL the time. Also, if you ever have any issues or questions, he emails back super fast. 100% would recommend.
VERY HELPFUL

Dr. Katzman was probably the most intelligent professor I had at KSU. He is one of the professors that make your degree more than a piece of paper. He grades fairly but this is the professor you take to learn from rather than getting an easy A to boost your GPA. The class is challenging but very rewarding for those interested in the topic.

This class is not a joke but Katzman made it enjoyable and understandable. His tests are HARD so study harder and you should do well. He knows his exams are difficult so he curves nicely. He's a great professor and is very laid back and easy to talk to. He's the type of professor you want to be friends with.

Great professor. Teaches students to think and not just memorize information. Class consists of 2 tests (very hard tests, but he curves them) and a few group cases. Take Prof. Katzman. You will learn a lot about the business world.

Very good teacher, explains everything thoroughly well, which is important for such a challenging subject. Posts lecture powerpoints online for  studying, making the textbook obsolete, and no need to take notes. However, I highly recommend going to class and listening carefully, and study until you understand it all well.

Attendance not mandatory but if there's low amnts, then 2 extra bonus pnts. Don't buy the book but rather the study guide for the txtbook-helps a lot more and do the exercises. He reads his ppts that are uploaded. Tests are hard, just read notes like no other. Comments here and there are funny. Not bad

Great Professor! Explains everything very clearly and his power points are great when studying for exams! PB knows his subject well and makes Econ interesting. I declared Econ as my major due to his teaching. Attendance not mandatory but recommend you don't miss class. Take him!

Great Professor!  The book is just abunch of Harvard articles and he explains everything.  Tests are challenging, but he curves strongly.  Highly recommend, and you're guaranteed an A or B unless you just don't even try.

One of the best professors I've taken in any school. Extremely knowledgeable and willing to help you learn. He doesn't like to give his own opinion on things. Tests are hard but fair. Buying the extra study guide helped bring my grade up from a B to an A, but you have to work hard to get the grade.

Bret is a funny & hilarious guy. He is very knowledgable about the subject. If you read the chapters and listen to his lectures and do the study guides he provides then you should do fine in the class.

He explains the material really well. 2 exams which are relatively hard so you need to be prepared, and some group case studies so make sure you get into a good group. He is extremely intelligent and is eager to teach what he knows.

He's incredibly knowledgeable, and funny as hell, he had me cracking up in class on many occasions. If you're interested in econ, you should definitely take him, because this class will give a great foundation, but if it's not your strong point, know that his tests are HARD! Although he curves them big time.

I would advise not taking this professor if economics is not one of your strong points. Although he curves grades, his test are extremely hard. I am a Junior with a 3.8 GPA and made my first C in his class.

He's hilarious, and keeps you interested in something boring. Gives tons of extra credit points. Also, the tests are hard but he curves them like crazy, on one test there was a 28 point curve. Great guy, knows what he's doing, take him and you'll make lots of money, etc., etc.

He was super nice. But the class was hard, so you need to pay attention. Yes, he curves the test, but i would do so bad, that even the curve didn't help. So be careful. But he was nice. all around great class.  I would recommend him

ABSOLUTELY AWSOME!! Tough Test, But he curves the "Hell out of them" as he would say.  Talks anout real life examples i.e. Beer, Parties, ETC.  Do not have to go to class at all, but smart to.  Also I never used the Book.

This guy is FREAKING AMAZING!!! I was going through quite a lot with my father passing away during the time I was taking his class and as a result of that I didn't do so well in the class, although I know I probably deserved an F in the class he didn't fail me. I'm retaking his class this semester.There is absolutely NOTHING bad to say about him.

Prof. Katzman is awesome! His tests can be difficult but he curves them so everybody gets a fair grade. Regardless of your grade you will learn a ton and walk away an edge on the competition in the business world. Definitely take him.
Great professor.....tests are a little bit difficult but just go over the power point and you will be fine. I would encourage anyone to take him.
4 tests for the entire semester. Great professor, cares for students. Takes time to answer any questions. Attendance is not mandatory. Easy A if you look over notes and do study guide.
BEST.TEACHER.EVER.PERIOD.

One of my favorite professors in my 2 years at university. First day of class I thought he was pompous and sleazy and I almost dropped the class. I'm glad I didn't because he turned out to be one of the nicest and most helpful professors I've had. Makes a boring subject like ECON bearable. Tests are hard but his grading curve will save your butt.
Dr. Katzman is such a great teacher! I was one of those students that had such a negative view of econ and he made it intersting and im actually thinking of majoring in it! TAKE HIM!
Awesome professor. He explains things very well, you do not have to go to class but it definitely helps. Tests are very hard but I would take another one of his classes.
he is awesome
Funny, keeps you interested in the class. Exams are hard but there is a curve.... Highly recommend taking this professor you wont regret it.
Really cool teacher, knows what it is to be a student, he is very helpful and will explain so you could understand the material. Attend class and listen to his explanations to do well in tests.
Great class to take, very interesting and entertaining :)
awesome

Excellent teacher - can teach to your level.  Is very confident in what he knows.  Midterm will kick your butt - so study hard (be he does curve).  Very useful info that you can use in job.  I like this teacher.
a little arrogant but a good sense of humor
Knows his stuff and can teach it.  Adjusted his class to meet the level of the class he was teaching.
he is a bad teacher
Great Class. Number of examples in class is not a problem. If you don't understand, ask. Best of the professors so far at KSU
Great Class.  Not easy and you shouldnt take it unless you are strong in basic Econ.  A lot of people in my class struggled because of that.  I would definitely take Katzman again.
awesome
Nice Guy. Explains things very well. Hes a little detached from his students but over all an excellent instructor
Hands down best instructor at KSU.
Really, really hard class but probably some of the most useful information I've learn in school.  Really cool guy too.
No Comments
No Comments
